scripts.build: pnpm build:interpolation && pnpm build:core && pnpm build:content && pnpm build:config && pnpm build:aerobuilt
scripts.vscode:package: pnpm run build:vscode && pnpm --dir packages/aero-vscode exec vsce package
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules && find packages -type d \( -name node_modules -o -name dist -o -name .output \) -prune -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.release:prep: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm install && pnpm build
